name: Koalaclysm
description:
Sam is the last surviving Koalanaut and his home on Mars is under attack by evil space aliens. It’s your job to help him fight them off. Unlock power-ups to give Sam the strength he needs as he flips through the Martian atmosphere to defend his home. The more aliens you defeat the stronger Sam becomes! Help Sam fight his way across the Universe!

Tap to aim and release to jump! Collide with alien spaceships, slimes, or tanks to make them explode! Don't let your base get destroyed!

Unlock power-ups to give Sam a variety of skills such as the ability to jump even while in the air!

Unlock different environments for Sam to explore!

I hope this game helps raise awareness for the countless animals lost due to recent fires in Australia. If you would like to help in any way, please visit koalaclysm.com to learn how!
